#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
        int t,a,b,i,j,k,l,sum,u,v;
        scanf("%d",&t);
        while(t--) {
                scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
                l = 0;
                for (i=a; i<=b; i++) {
                        sum = 0;
                        v = i;
                        while(v > 0){
                                u = v %10;
                                v = v/10;
                                sum = sum + u;
                        }
                        k = 0;
                        if (sum == 1)
                                continue;
                        for (j = 2; j <= sum-1; j++) {
                                if (sum%j==0){
                                        k++;
                                }
                        }
                        if (k == 0) {
                                l++;
                        }
                }
                printf("%d\n",l);
        }
        return 0;
}
